Key Match Events: England were bundled out for 103 before the West Indies reached the target with nine wickets and 17 balls to spare.
Chris Jordan top-scored for England with 28 from 23 balls.
Brandon King scored an unbeaten 52 from 49 deliveries.
Jason Holder finished with format-best figures of four for seven as England were all out in 19.4 overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Barbados.
England's bowlers were efficient but non-threatening.
The Windies are without Chris Gayle at the top of the order.
Adil Rashid ensured England would not suffer a first 10-wicket T20 defeat by dismissing Shai Hope.
Liam Dawson made his first international appearance since October 2018.
